DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to examine the effect of alpha-neurofeedback while subjects listen to a noise on tinnitus.
DOC.brief_title: Countering Stimulus-Induced Alpha-Desynchronization to Treat Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: Duration of Tinnitus >= 6 months and <= 20 years Subjective Tinnitus History of neurological or more than mild psychiatric diseases
